trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the strokes that are a result of the eraser path erasing a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os traços que são um resultado do caminho da borracha que apaga um traço.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> that contains the strokes that are created after the eraser path erases part of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> que contém os traços criados depois que o caminho de borracha apaga a parte de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.GetPointEraseResults%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains the strokes that result in the eraser path erasing the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A> where they intersect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.GetPointEraseResults%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> que contém os traços que resultam no caminho de borracha apagar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A> onde elas se cruzam.

trans-unit.source: If the eraser path intersects the middle of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.GetPointEraseResults%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Se o caminho de borracha intercepta o meio de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.GetPointEraseResults%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> que contém dois novos traçados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> that is intersected by the eraser path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> interseccionado pelo caminho de borracha.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> that is intersected by the eraser path.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> que se cruzam pelo caminho de borracha.
